title: Operation Zulu: Dos
description: Operation Zulu : Dead Island was the end. Now read how it all began in the exciting Operation Zulu : Dos! Sergeant Lin Morgan and Rollie Hale lead a team of soldiers on a mission to capture the head of a Mexican drug cartel. It will be anything but a cakewalk. The soldiers must battle cartel thugs, government conspiracies and ravenous zombies to survive. And cutting a path through it all is the evil Mister Black. Operation Zulu : Dos is filled with blood, guts and splattered brains. The zombie apocalypse begins in Mexico.
author: Allen Gamboa
